short_summary: Solicitation for Underwater Diver Propulsion System Sol. B
description: This solicitation of offers cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number Doc3826288609  dated 13/01/2023 with a closing of 13/02/2023 at 2:00 PM. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeror's who offered on the previous solicitation.
tags: Underwater Diver Propulsion System Sol. B
full_summary:
# Underwater Diver Propulsion System Solution

## Solicitation Information

**Reference Number:** WS4067196161-Doc4067316117
**Solicitation Number:** WS4067196161
**Publication Date:** June 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT

## Contract Information

*   **Provision Deliverables:** Thirty-eight (38) Underwater Diver Propulsion Systems for training and operational scenarios, with an optional requirement for additional units.
*   **Required Services:** Training services, maintenance services, and spare parts on an as-needed basis upon receipt of a Task Authorization.
*   **Delivery Period:** 210 days from the contract award date.
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal.
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering.
*   **Trade Agreements:** The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) is applicable.

## Contracting Entity and End-User Information

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End-User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Contact Information:**

    *   **Contact Name:** Sean Webster
    *   **Contact Email:** sean.webster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    *   **Region of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

## Bidder Eligibility and Submission Requirements

*   **Eligible Bidders:** Suppliers who previously submitted offers for the previous solicitation (Doc3826288609) are eligible to bid on this requirement.
*   **Submission Requirements:**
    *   All bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EDT on June 28, 2023.
    *   Any submissions after the deadline will be considered non-responsive.
    *   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Evaluation Criteria

*   Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

## Right to Negotiate

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

You must ensure that you understand all the details of this solicitation before submitting a bid. If you have any questions, you can reach out to the contact person for more information.

Format this rewritten version into nice markdown format as requested in your prompt.
